import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Countdown extends Component{ state = { min: "", sec: "00", timeInputValue: 10, disableTimeInput: false, playerTime: "", buttonText: "start", mountTimer: false, isRunning: false, mountReset: false, } render(){ return(
{props.min} : {props.sec}
: {props.sec}
) } } export default Countdown;
